articles.title: Steve Smith, Marnus Labuschagne Lead Holi Celebrations In Australian Camp. See Pics - NDTV Sports
articles.description: As both the teams gear up for the fourth Test, the Steve Smith-led side took some time off and celebrated Holi
articles.content: After Team India's Holi celebration videos created a storm on social media, a series of pictures -- showing the Australian team enjoying the festival of colours -- has now created a new buzz among th… [+1611 chars]
